string.text: {?DAYS}You've been forced to work as a prostitute at {SETTLEMENT_NAME} for {NUMBER_OF_DAYS} {?PLURAL}days{?}day{\?}.{?}You're being forced to work as a prostitute at {SETTLEMENT_NAME}.{\?} Waiting for a customer...

{?DAYS}You've been forced to work as a prostitute at {SETTLEMENT_NAME} for {NUMBER_OF_DAYS} {?PLURAL}days{?}day{\?}.{?}You're being forced to work as a prostitute at {SETTLEMENT_NAME}.{\?} Waiting for a customer...
Request your freedom.
{?DAYS}You've been a prostitute at {SETTLEMENT_NAME} for {NUMBER_OF_DAYS} {?PLURAL}days{?}day{\?}.{?}You're working as a prostitute at {SETTLEMENT_NAME}.{\?} Waiting for a customer...
{?DAYS}You've been a prostitute at {SETTLEMENT_NAME} for {NUMBER_OF_DAYS} {?PLURAL}days{?}day{\?}.{?}You're working as a prostitute at {SETTLEMENT_NAME}.{\?} Waiting for a customer...
{?DAYS}You've been managing the brothel at {SETTLEMENT_NAME} for {NUMBER_OF_DAYS} {?PLURAL}days{?}day{\?}.{?}You're managing the brothel at {SETTLEMENT_NAME}.{\?} Waiting for a customer...

{?DAYS}You've been forced to work as a prostitute at {SETTLEMENT_NAME} for {NUMBER_OF_DAYS} {?PLURAL}days{?}day{\?}.{?}You're being forced to work as a prostitute at {SETTLEMENT_NAME}.{\?} The brothel is closed due to the siege. You hope your guards don't get any ideas about taking out their stress on your ass...

{?DAYS}You've been a prostitute at {SETTLEMENT_NAME} for {NUMBER_OF_DAYS} {?PLURAL}days{?}day{\?}.{?}You are a prostitute at {SETTLEMENT_NAME}.{\?} The brothel is closed due to the siege. This seems distinctly unfair, as who could possibly need a bit of relaxation more than men suffering the stress of imminent combat?

{?DAYS}You've been managing the brothel at {SETTLEMENT_NAME} for {NUMBER_OF_DAYS} {?PLURAL}days{?}day{\?}.{?}You're managing the brothel at {SETTLEMENT_NAME}.{\?} The brothel is closed due to the siege. This seems distinctly unfair, as who could possibly need a bit of relaxation more than men suffering the stress of imminent combat?

{?DAYS}You've been a slave at {SETTLEMENT_NAME} for {NUMBER_OF_DAYS} {?PLURAL}days{?}day{\?}.{?}You are a slave at {SETTLEMENT_NAME}.{\?} You wait for your tormentor to return, watching for any chance to escape...
{?DAYS}You've been a slave at {SETTLEMENT_NAME} for {NUMBER_OF_DAYS} {?PLURAL}days{?}day{\?}.{?}You are a slave at {SETTLEMENT_NAME}.{\?} You wait for your master to return...
{?DAYS}You've been a slave at {SETTLEMENT_NAME} for {NUMBER_OF_DAYS} {?PLURAL}days{?}day{\?}.{?}You are a slave at {SETTLEMENT_NAME}.{\?} You wait obediently for your master to return...

{?DAYS}You've been a slave at {SETTLEMENT_NAME} for {NUMBER_OF_DAYS} {?PLURAL}days{?}day{\?}.{?}You are a broken slave at {SETTLEMENT_NAME}.{\?} You wait obediently for your master to make use of you...

{?DAYS}You've been a slave at {SETTLEMENT_NAME} for {NUMBER_OF_DAYS} {?PLURAL}days{?}day{\?}.{?}You are a slave at {SETTLEMENT_NAME}.{\?} You wait at the market, your body on display like a piece of meat as passerby make lewd comments about your appearance...
{?DAYS}You've been a slave at {SETTLEMENT_NAME} for {NUMBER_OF_DAYS} {?PLURAL}days{?}day{\?}.{?}You are a broken slave at {SETTLEMENT_NAME}.{\?} You wait obediently for someone to make use of you...

{?DAYS}You've been a slave at {SETTLEMENT_NAME} for {NUMBER_OF_DAYS} {?PLURAL}days{?}day{\?}.{?}You are a slave at {SETTLEMENT_NAME}.{\?} There is currently a siege going on so your tormentor has locked you up. You silently hope the siege succeeds so that you can be rescued, or at least escape in the confusion.

{?DAYS}You've been a slave at {SETTLEMENT_NAME} for {NUMBER_OF_DAYS} {?PLURAL}days{?}day{\?}.{?}You are a slave at {SETTLEMENT_NAME}.{\?} There is currently a siege going on so your master has locked you up. You silently hope the siege succeeds so that you can be rescued, or at least escape in the confusion.

{?DAYS}You've been a slave at {SETTLEMENT_NAME} for {NUMBER_OF_DAYS} {?PLURAL}days{?}day{\?}.{?}You are a slave at {SETTLEMENT_NAME}.{\?} There is currently a siege going on so your master has locked you up. You silently hope the siege fails. Wait... What is going on?

{?DAYS}You've been a slave at {SETTLEMENT_NAME} for {NUMBER_OF_DAYS} {?PLURAL}days{?}day{\?}.{?}You are a broken slave at {SETTLEMENT_NAME}.{\?} There's a siege going on, so your master has you servicing the defenders to keep up morale...

{?DAYS}You've been a slave at {SETTLEMENT_NAME} for {NUMBER_OF_DAYS} {?PLURAL}days{?}day{\?}.{?}You are a slave at {SETTLEMENT_NAME}.{\?} There is currently a siege going on so the markets are closed. At least that means you're not on display anymore...

{?DAYS}You've been a slave at {SETTLEMENT_NAME} for {NUMBER_OF_DAYS} {?PLURAL}days{?}day{\?}.{?}You are a broken slave at {SETTLEMENT_NAME}.{\?} There's a siege going on, and you are servicing the defenders to keep up morale...

{?DAYS}You've been a slave {?ISCARAVAN}in the {PARTY_NAME}{?}of {PARTY_NAME}{\?} for {NUMBER_OF_DAYS} {?PLURAL}days{?}day{\?}.{?}You are a slave {?ISCARAVAN}in the {PARTY_NAME}{?}of {PARTY_NAME}{\?}.{\?}

{?DAYS}You've been a slave {?ISCARAVAN}in the {PARTY_NAME}{?}of {PARTY_NAME}{\?} for {NUMBER_OF_DAYS} {?PLURAL}days{?}day{\?}.{?}You are a slave {?ISCARAVAN}in the {PARTY_NAME}{?}of {PARTY_NAME}{\?}.{\?}
